gift_Likeability_unlock.name: Random Upgrade Drive
gift_Likeability_unlock.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Simulacrum.

gift_Likeability_unlock_norn.name: Random Upgrade Drive
gift_Likeability_unlock_norn.description: An upgrade drive module developed by Hykros to further upgrade the Simulacrum system. Can be used to improve the combat capabilities of a Simulacrum.

Item_gift_1001.name: Flower bouquet
Item_gift_1001.description: A nicely presented batch of flowers and a prime gift choice, though watch out for those who are allergic to pollen or dislike plants. The flowers are produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1002.name: Dumbbells
Item_gift_1002.description: An instrument for weight training and mostly used for fitness—except in certain drastic situations... Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1003.name: Nice picture frame
Item_gift_1003.description: Specifically made for safekeeping precious photos, thus built from special materials and difficult to take apart. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_1004.name: Postcard of Aida
Item_gift_1004.description: Shows different landscapes on Aida. Despite Omnium radiation pollution and other adverse conditions, there is still scenery worth preserving. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1005.name: Wool scarf
Item_gift_1005.description: It's supposed to be made of processed wool, but since that is now obsolete, the "wool" is actually a composite material. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1006.name: Custom poker deck
Item_gift_1006.description: No one knows who created this deck, but judging from the rules of play, the maker must have been a very interesting fellow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1007.name: Mini potted plant
Item_gift_1007.description: Miniature potted plant. Please note that the plant is artificial and needs no conventional care. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1008.name: Retro harmonica
Item_gift_1008.description: For playing lovely melodies. It's hard to come by, so only a few people on Aida can actually play one. Nowadays, that's probably limited to the true music aficionados. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1009.name: Paper pinwheel
Item_gift_1009.description: A plain toy that couldn't be more ordinary, but nonetheless has never failed to bring comfort and joy. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1010.name: Snack box
Item_gift_1010.description: Snack box created by Fennie on Astra, containing various irresistible munchies. A very popular gift across all sectors. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_1011.name: Moonflower Ornament
Item_gift_1011.description: A model ornament made with the moon flower as a prototype. After conducting an ecological transformation program for some time, the buds of the moon flower were found for the first time on a gobi in Vera.

Item_gift_2001.name: Tool set
Item_gift_2001.description: Designed for practical purposes and is ready to use. May also be applied as spare parts. Receives a big thumbs-up from technicians for its versatility. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2002.name: Chess Set
Item_gift_2002.description: A game for two players, though some people actually prefer playing by themselves. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2003.name: Plush toy
Item_gift_2003.description: Kids' favorite plush toy. Adorable with a scent reminiscent of a warm day under the sun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2004.name: Tailor-made suit
Item_gift_2004.description: Custom-made suit, finer and suaver than the common variety, with accessories to boot. Those with dramatic flair should like it. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2005.name: Vitamin pack
Item_gift_2005.description: Wellness supplement. A necessity for those working too long or too indulged in playing games to have proper meals. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2006.name: Gem necklace
Item_gift_2006.description: How much is this gem necklace worth? Forget all the speculations and just keep this valuable safe! Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2007.name: Cat throw pillow
Item_gift_2007.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a cat. Very relaxing and therapeutic to hold. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2008.name: Coloring book
Item_gift_2008.description: The seller said once all the pages have been colored in, you can trade it in for a brand new one. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2009.name: Meteorite in a bottle
Item_gift_2009.description: Meteorite in a clear bottle. The meteorite seems to be a space rock that's not burned out and some sort of mineral mixture giving off a faint glow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2010.name: Perfume bottle
Item_gift_2010.description: Lovely, elegant glass vial with pleasantly scented liquid inside. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2011.name: Tartarus ornament
Item_gift_2011.description: A miniature figure allegedly takes after the form of Tartarus. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2012.name: New Kalka ornament
Item_gift_2012.description: Receiving a flood of complaints protesting the discontinued production of the old Kalka figure, the makers decided to offer a new version. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2013.name: Mad Dumont figurine
Item_gift_2013.description: Nobody knows when the fad for the Mad Dumont figurine began, except everyone wants one all of a sudden. Produced in Aesperia, Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2014.name: Moonrabbit kit
Item_gift_2014.description: Assembly required. Based on the image of moonrabbit. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2015.name: Spirit Princess figurine
Item_gift_2015.description: Miniature figurine based on Spirit Princess, the smart servant. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_2016.name: Mirroria Toy Bricks
Item_gift_2016.description: The Mirroria pocket model has a high level of craftsmanship.

Item_gift_2017.name: Rabbit Throw Pillow
Item_gift_2017.description: A throw pillow in the shape of a rabbit. It's very relaxing and therapeutic to hold it.

Item_gift_2018.name: Inkwell
Item_gift_2018.description: For those who love to consume knowledge. But don't consume it, of course.

Item_gift_2019.name: Small Wooden Sword
Item_gift_2019.description: A handmade accessory by a craftsman with a superb mastery of ancient techniques. It holds some value as a collector's item.

Item_gift_2020.name: Broiling Sun Scarf
Item_gift_2020.description: An elegant scarf that brings a lot of warm in winter.

Item_gift_3001.name: New game console
Item_gift_3001.description: New high-end game console, designed by a computer genius. The high production cost has caused its shortage. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3002.name: Snow globe
Item_gift_3002.description: Originated in the Warren Snowfield, it reflects pure driven snow during winter. It's now been remade into a household decoration. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3003.name: Music box
Item_gift_3003.description: A metal music box. Not sure if its previous owner broke it or what, but the pleasant tune has been shut off somehow. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3004.name: Silver cookware
Item_gift_3004.description: An expensive-looking complete set of cookware. Supposedly it was owned by a neurotic chef who never let anyone touch these precious tools. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3005.name: Aida comic
Item_gift_3005.description: Depicts the adventures of Tata on Aida in monthly issues. The limited quantity and popularity have led to fights over the comic book every release. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3006.name: Banges Specialty
Item_gift_3006.description: Contains various specialties from Banges, each box a random selection to represent local diversity. Of course, that means you never know exactly what you're going to get. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3007.name: 3d Hykros puzzle
Item_gift_3007.description: A puzzle that's sweeping Hykros. The novel appearance and gameplay are nothing but fun. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3008.name: Warren fossil
Item_gift_3008.description: Ancient remains sealed in ice, discovered in Warren Snowfield. Very rare and highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3009.name: Crown token
Item_gift_3009.description: Limited commemorative coins minted by Crown with a portrait of the mines' owner on the front and a stylized "K" on the back. Collect seven of these babies and get a day off with pay—maybe. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in them.

Item_gift_3010.name: Limited Tata figurine
Item_gift_3010.description: Limited collectible figurine, an Aida comic memorabilia. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3011.name: Metal Alf figurine
Item_gift_3011.description: To fully resemble the original Alf, the makers made this one out of metal. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3012.name: Smarty doll
Item_gift_3012.description: A toy based on the image of Smarty. The makers replaced the artificial plant on its head with a live plant, making it highly collectible. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3013.name: Limited Peanut figurine
Item_gift_3013.description: Very rare miniature figurine with data storage and volume control features. Since it's based on the feline Peanut, it's popular among cat lovers. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3014.name: Void Angel figurine
Item_gift_3014.description: A miniature figurine based on the Void Angel. It's white all over and requires special care to keep spotless. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3015.name: Angela ornament
Item_gift_3015.description: A miniature replica of Angela, the smart servant, that even includes the pair of cute pink wings on her back. Produced in Aesperia, and Simulacra from other regions may not be interested in it.

Item_gift_3016.name: Ultimate Warrior Otter
Item_gift_3016.description: Designed for the 40th anniversary of the Ultimate Warrior Battlefield: Ultimate Warrior Battlefield 40 is now available. Buy it now and get limited merchandise of the powerful SSR Otter.

Item_gift_3017.name: School Idol Linnie
Item_gift_3017.description: This is the No.1 best-selling figurine in Mirroria and it strikingly resembles someone familiar at first glance. It's rumored to be based on a popular administrator from Mirroria, although the creator firmly denies these claims.

Item_gift_3018.name: Death Metal
Item_gift_3018.description: The infinite soul shock that spreads out from the deep roar is the music enlightenment for some.

Item_gift_3019.name: Puzzle Blocks
Item_gift_3019.description: A must-have for parties. It's always fun to play games with ingenious friends.

Item_gift_3020.name: Mirroria Travel Guide
Item_gift_3020.description: A digital travel guide for visitors of Mirroria. Funny enough, its author never considered it could become useful someday.

Item_gift_3021.name: Baguenaudier
Item_gift_3021.description: Even if you just can't solve it... you can't smash it apart!

Item_gift_3022.name: Panda Doll
Item_gift_3022.description: A unique panda doll that is said to be the secret mascot of the Pavilion of Literature.

Item_gift_3023.name: Legend of the Sword God
Item_gift_3023.description: A famous Wuxia novel in Domain 9, written by the novelist, Xin Jian. It's about a master of the sword who brings justice to the world.

Item_gift_3024.name: Heavenly Palm
Item_gift_3024.description: Young man, you have amazing bone structure. You're a martial arts genius. I'll leave the important responsibility of protecting the peace and justice in Domain 9 to you! I have this book here, Heavenly Palm. The Heavenly Palm is a palm technique beyond the eyes of mortals...

Item_gift_3025.name: Agarwood Fan
Item_gift_3025.description: Here comes a draught of fragrance.

Item_gift_3026.name: Ink Pen
Item_gift_3026.description: A specially-crafted fountain pen with ink designed to resist freezing, even in the most frigid conditions.

Item_gift_3027.name: Fur Blanket
Item_gift_3027.description: A blanket made of the fine coat of a rare ferocious beast. It provides excellent protection against the cold.

Item_gift_3028.name: White Tiger Ice Sculpture
Item_gift_3028.description: A carefully carved white tiger ice sculpture that has been specially treated and sealed to keep the ice from melting. It makes a fine gift.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.name: Black Crow's Feather
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_005.description: The whistling from it cutting through the wind seems audible as you gaze upon it.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.name: Zhuyan Scale Mail
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_006.description: The patterns on the scale mail make it obvious that it was no ordinary civilization behind its creation.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.name: Graystone
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_007.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. An essential material used in the production of certain alloy devices.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.name: Red Ore
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_008.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its bright crimson hue is eerily reminiscent of blood.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.name: Sky Crystal
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_009.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its crystal-clear appearance sparkles brightly in the sunlight.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.name: Umbra Rock
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_010.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its unusual texture grants it a strange color.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.name: Standard Lamellar Armor
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_011.description: A small, standard-style lamellar armor that offers pretty good defensive performance.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.name: Weapon License
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_028.description: A key system that grants permission to use weapons.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_029.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_030.name: Power Core
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_030.description: A very valuable Power Core that keeps machinery running.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_031.name: Mechs Bolt
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_031.description: A common mechanical part that may be small but very useful.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_032.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_032.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_033.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
Item_Jiuyu_Harvest_033.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

PENPEN_Harvest.name: Pet Control Module
PENPEN_Harvest.description: The control module used to upgrade Pen Pen's jetpack. Its control system is more suitable for Pen Pen.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.name: Dark Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_01.description: A crystal formed on the surface from leaking leyline energy. Affected by the environment, it produces a lattice that tends to reflect more purple light, from whence it gets its name. It is a low-energy source.

Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.name: Ginger Essence
Item_Jiuyu_Mine_02.description: A crystal formed through energy leaking to the surface from leylines. Easily affected by the environment, these produce a lattice that reflects more yellow light, from whence it gets its name. It is a high-energy source.

EVA_stone_box.name: Mecha Upgrade Material Supply Box
EVA_stone_box.description: A specially prepared exploration giftbox for Executors, containing essentials for enhancing their mecha.

gift_Mount_006_skin.name: Windfall Meteor Box
gift_Mount_006_skin.description: Picked it up by chance. Which one of the shining meteors will be inside the palm of your hand?

gift_Mount_006_skin_medium.name: Windfall Meteor Box
gift_Mount_006_skin_medium.description: Picked it up by chance. Which one of the shining meteors will be inside the palm of your hand?

choose_Mount_006_skin_medium.name: Meteor Box Reserve
choose_Mount_006_skin_medium.description: In the dazzling rain of stars, there must be one of your destiny.

EnergyFurnace_eyeball.description: Eyes adept at discovering field energy.

EnergyFurnace_avatarframe.name: Four Symbols Supply: Domain of the Four Symbols
EnergyFurnace_avatarframe.description: Field energy is omnipresent within Domain 9 across the lands of the four states.

EnergyFurnace_title.name: Four Symbols Supply: Model Worker of Domain 9
EnergyFurnace_title.description: Your collection of field energy has greatly helped the construction of Domain 9. Thank you for your contributions.

gift_breakthrough_abcd2_autouse.name: Random Weapon Augment Kit II
gift_breakthrough_abcd2_autouse.description: A random box containing nano coating II, acidproof glaze II, booster frame II, nanofiber frame II.

gift_breakthrough_abcd1_autouse.name: Random Weapon Augment Kit I
gift_breakthrough_abcd1_autouse.description: A kit containing either nano coating I, acidproof glaze I, booster frame I, nanofiber frame I.

gift_breakthrough_abcd1_RandomRuin.name: Spacetime Domain Material Box
gift_breakthrough_abcd1_RandomRuin.description: Random box with a high chance of getting 1 material and a small chance of getting 2 materials.

Item_WormholeEnergy_pack.name: Void Energy
Item_WormholeEnergy_pack.description: The highly efficient energy source collected from the Void. Executors can use it to activate hidden functions when exploring the void, greatly enhancing combat capability.

LevyClone_time.name: Spatial Reorganizer
LevyClone_time.description: Specific devices that can reassemble known spatial fragments. Use it to freely select fragments to connect together.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.name: Space Orientator I
item_activity_time_LevyClone_01.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Midlevel Control Room" after use.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.name: Space Orientator II
item_activity_time_LevyClone_02.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Phantasmic Zenith" after use.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.name: Space Orientator III
item_activity_time_LevyClone_03.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures a specific segment, which will be directionally connected to the "Shattered Realm" after use.

item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.name: Space Orientator IV
item_activity_time_LevyClone_04.description: A device that traces the trajectory of spacetime transmissions and captures specific fragments, which will be directionally connected to the Battle Test Area after use.

Blindbox_SpringFestival_2022.description: Limited-Time giftbox offered to celebrate the arrival of spring. It's always a mixture of anticipation and trepidation when you open the box.

gift_BigClient_01.name: Wanderer's Welcome Pack
gift_BigClient_01.description: Hope these gifts will send the otter's regards and appreciation to the trailblazer.

gift_BigClient_birthday.name: Wanderer's Birthday Present
gift_BigClient_birthday.description: The otter has prepared a birthday gift for the Trailblazer and looked forward to the day— Happy Birthday!
